SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Use Generator+Critic to produce a robust application security review protocol tailored to LLM-based systems processing PII and proprietary data.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: 1. Threat models: prompt injection, data exfiltration, misuse. 2. Logging/redaction, access control, human override, auditability. 3. English-only; PCG + ratings. 4. Gates, test cases, rollback must be explicit. 5. Dual Output + Verification required.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Generator + External Critic (N=2) with feedback and mandatory corrections.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: Numeric ratings; feedback cycles; strict XML; PCG + MSV; dual output; document gates/rollback.
